author: A319
post_text: July 12, 2015 at 9:34 PM#1Is there a way to execute a "Take Selection" command for an effect via the command line? For example, take selection for effect X = group 1...

posts.author: A319
posts.post_text: July 12, 2015 at 9:34 PM#1Is there a way to execute a "Take Selection" command for an effect via the command line? For example, take selection for effect X = group 1...

posts.author: Bassfly
posts.post_text: July 17, 2015 at 12:51 PM#2Group xStore effect 1.y.* (If you want to take it to all lines)Store effect 1.y.z (if you want to store to a specific line)X = group NrY = effect NrZ = effect line

title: Take Selection syntax
